# studio.spec-editor

Manage capability, workflow, policy, and component specs with validation and preview services.

    key: 'studio.spec-editor',

      'Manage capability, workflow, policy, and component specs with validation and preview services.',

  provides: [

      surface: 'operation',

      version: 1,

      version: 1,

    {

      key: 'studio.spec.preview',
      version: 1,
      description: 'Produce a runnable preview state from a spec draft.',
